languages.text: {n}Кибелла шепотом обращается к вам.{/n} "В его голосе и том, как он держится, я не ощущаю лжи, Домин'{name}. Он чувствует смерть и приветствует ее с искренностью. Момент благоволит нам узнать больше. Предавший клятвы не назовет имени Немезита, но из его речей да извлечем мы знание о сути врага".

{n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла шепотом обращается к вам.{/n} "В его голосе и том, как он держится, я не ощущаю лжи, Домин'{name}. Он чувствует смерть и приветствует ее с искренностью. Момент благоволит нам узнать больше. Предавший клятвы не назовет имени Немезита, но из его речей да извлечем мы знание о сути врага".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah whispers to you.{/n} "The beating of his heart bears no deception, Enim'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us, we must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine the knowledge of our enemy."

He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine the knowledge of our enemy."

{n}Kibellah whispers to you:{/n} "The beating of his heart bears no deception, Enim'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

{n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

{n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah flüstert dir zu:{/n} "Ich spüre keine Lüge in seiner Stimme oder seinem Verhalten, Domin'{name}. Er fühlt und begrüßt den Tod mit offenen Armen. Der Moment ist günstig. Wir müssen mehr erfahren. Er, der sein Gelübde brach, wird uns Nemesit nicht ausliefern, aber aus seinen Worten können wir Wissen über unseren Feind schöpfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah flüstert dir zu:{/n} "Ich spüre keine Lüge in seiner Stimme oder seinem Verhalten, Domin'{name}. Er fühlt und begrüßt den Tod mit offenen Armen. Der Moment ist günstig. Wir müssen mehr erfahren. Er, der sein Gelübde brach, wird uns Nemesit nicht ausliefern, aber aus seinen Worten können wir Wissen über unseren Feind schöpfen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah te susurra al oído:{/n} «No oigo mentira alguna en su voz ni su porte, Domin'{name}. Presiente su muerte y la recibe con los brazos abiertos. El momento es propicio. Debemos averiguar más. Alguien que ha traicionado sus votos no nos entregará a Nemesitio, pero sus palabras podrían revelarnos más cosas sobre nuestro enemigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah te susurra al oído:{/n} «No oigo mentira alguna en su voz ni su porte, Domin'{name}. Presiente su muerte y la recibe con los brazos abiertos. El momento es propicio. Debemos averiguar más. Alguien que ha traicionado sus votos no nos entregará a Nemesitio, pero sus palabras podrían revelarnos más cosas sobre nuestro enemigo».

languages.text: {n}キベラが囁く。{/n}「心臓の鼓動に偽りはないわ、ドミン・{name}。彼は死を感じ、両手を広げて歓迎している。この瞬間は私たちに好都合。もっと知らないといけない。誓いを破った者がネメサイトをこちらに引き渡すことはないだろうけど、彼の言葉から敵のことを知ることができるはず」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが囁く。{/n}「心臓の鼓動に偽りはないわ、ドミン・{name}。彼は死を感じ、両手を広げて歓迎している。この瞬間は私たちに好都合。もっと知らないといけない。誓いを破った者がネメサイトをこちらに引き渡すことはないだろうけど、彼の言葉から敵のことを知ることができるはず」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈悄悄对你开了口。{/n}“他的声音中没有谎言的迹象，秘者{name}。他已经张开了双臂，迎接死亡，这是个好机会。尽管这个背弃誓言的人不会将涅墨斯特交给我们，但我们可以通过他的话了解更多线索，弄清我们的敌人是谁。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈悄悄对你开了口。{/n}“他的声音中没有谎言的迹象，秘者{name}。他已经张开了双臂，迎接死亡，这是个好机会。尽管这个背弃誓言的人不会将涅墨斯特交给我们，但我们可以通过他的话了解更多线索，弄清我们的敌人是谁。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah s'adresse à vous dans un murmure :{/n} « Sa voix et son port ne mentent pas, Domin'{name}. Il sent son heure approcher et il accueille la mort à bras ouverts. Les conditions jouent en notre faveur. Nous devons en apprendre davantage. Ce parjure ne nous livrera pas Némésite, mais ses propos nous en dévoileront un peu plus sur notre ennemi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah s'adresse à vous dans un murmure :{/n} « Sa voix et son port ne mentent pas, Domin'{name}. Il sent son heure approcher et il accueille la mort à bras ouverts. Les conditions jouent en notre faveur. Nous devons en apprendre davantage. Ce parjure ne nous livrera pas Némésite, mais ses propos nous en dévoileront un peu plus sur notre ennemi. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah seninle fısıldayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Sesinde veya tavrında yalan sezmiyorum Domin'{name}. Ölümü hissediyor ve ona kucak açıyor. Bu an bizim avantajımıza. Daha fazla şey öğrenmeliyiz. Yeminlerine ihanet eden birisi bize Nemezit'i teslim etmez ancak sözlerinden düşmanımıza dair bilgi elde edebiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers to you,{/n} "I sense no lie in his voice or bearing, Domin'{name}. He feels and welcomes death with open arms. The moment favours us. We must learn more. He who betrayed his oaths will not deliver Nemesite to us, but from his words we may divine knowledge of our enemy."
